description: Returns an array containing metadata of the resources associated with the target backup plan.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The next item following a partial list of returned items. For example, if a request is made to return MaxResults number of items, NextToken allows you to return more items in your list starting at the location pointed to by the next token.

nested_items.name: BackupSelectionsList
nested_items.description: An array of backup selection list items containing metadata about each resource in the list.

nested_items.name: SelectionId
nested_items.description: Uniquely identifies a request to assign a set of resources to a backup plan.

nested_items.name: SelectionName
nested_items.description: The display name of a resource selection document.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time a backup plan is created, in Unix format and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). The value of CreationDate is accurate to milliseconds. For example, the value 1516925490.087 represents Friday, January 26, 2018 12:11:30.087 AM.

nested_items.name: CreatorRequestId
nested_items.description: A unique string that identifies the request and allows failed requests to be retried without the risk of running the operation twice. This parameter is optional.

nested_items.name: IamRoleArn
nested_items.description: Specifies the IAM role Amazon Resource Name (ARN) to create the target recovery point; for example, arn:aws:iam::123456789012:role/S3Access.
